message.content:
cs.IT, cs.ITP, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper deals with information processing, coding, and generation, which are all topics related to information theory (cs.IT). The use of Markov chains suggests a focus on stochastic processes and probability theory, which could fall under the sub-category of information theory and probability (cs.ITP). The paper also mentions the use of efficient computation, which could fall under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The mention of side-information suggests a focus on communication theory and signal processing, which could fall under the sub-category of signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the paper mentions the characterization of large deviation and moderate deviation regimes, which could fall under the sub-category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
